pkgmetadata.longdescription: Solver for Delay Differential Equations // This package solves systems of delay differential equations. by interfacing numerical routines written by Simon N. Wood , with contributions by Benjamin J. Cairns. These numerical routines first appeared in Simon Wood's solv95 program. This package includes a vignette and a complete user's guide. 'PBSddesolve' originally appeared on CRAN under the name 'ddesolve'. That version is no longer supported. The current name emphasizes a close association with other PBS packages, particularly 'PBSmodelling'.
